root.name: DJ Hero 3D
root.description: OverviewDJ Hero 3D was one of the confirmed titles for the 3DS. However, in February Activision revealed they had cancelled all games in the popular Guitar Hero and DJ Hero franchises that were in development, thereby canceling the title.GameplayDJ Hero 3DS's gameplay concept was to use the lower touch screen for switching cross faders scratching. Also, instead of using a peripheral, the game would have be played by tapping the screen in time.
